original_text: and whether the land is rich or poor, and whether there are trees in it or not. Be of good courage and bring some of the fruit of the land.” Now the time was the season of the first ripe grapes.
korean_text: 토지가 비옥한지 메마른지 나무가 있는지 없는지를 탐지하라 담대하라 또 그 땅의 실과를 가져오라 하니 그 때는 포도가 처음 익을 즈음이었더라

sentences.original_text: whether the land is rich or poor
whether there are trees in it or not
and bring some of the fruit of the land
Now the time was the season of the first ripe grapes
